solution_line_template: Michelle used {num_bags_flour} * {cups_per_bag} = <<{num_bags_flour}*{cups_per_bag}={total_cups_flour}>>{total_cups_flour} cups of flour in the pasta dough.
She made {total_cups_flour} / {cups_per_pound_dough} = <<{total_cups_flour}/{cups_per_pound_dough}={total_pounds_dough}>>{total_pounds_dough} pounds of pasta dough.
She needs {total_pounds_dough} / {pounds_per_rack} = <<{total_pounds_dough}/{pounds_per_rack}={racks_needed}>>{racks_needed} drying racks for the pasta.
Thus, Michelle needs {racks_needed} - {racks_owned} = <<{racks_needed}-{racks_owned}={additional_racks_needed}>>{additional_racks_needed} more drying rack.
